title: Uncovering the Truth: The Palestinian-Israeli Conflict
author: Daya

body.raw:
**Introduction**

In the age of information, it's essential to peel back the layers and unearth the truths 
hidden beneath the surface. The Palestinian-Israeli conflict is no exception. 
As we delve into the heart of this matter, we'll explore the reasons behind supporting Palestine, 
shedding light on the complexities that often remain obscured.

---

**The Manipulation of News**

*"The Scripted Narratives"*

In today's world, it's disheartening to discover that governments in some countries have resorted 
to nefarious acts, including the scripting of news to propagate their agendas. 
Major news outlets like CNN, BBC, Fox News, and various programs in the US and UK have not been 
immune to this manipulation. Discover how they've presented stories lacking evidence, 
created narratives, and, at times, even engaged in acts of performance.

---

**Support for Israel: The Financial Connection**

*"The Source of Israel's Prosperity"*

Ever wondered how Israel amassed such a wealth of weaponry and defense systems? 
The answer might surprise you. Uncover the role of taxpayer money and companies that 
provide royalties to Israel. Surprisingly, even tech giants like Microsoft and Apple are 
among those contributing significantly. This section delves into the financial links between 
these companies and Israel's defense.

---

**The Historical Context**

*"The Birth of Israel"*

So back to history, before the existence of Israel, there was a country called PALESTINE. 
During the NAZI occupation, Jews were hated among countries. So the Jews came to Palestine and 
begged for help. The warm welcome extended by Palestine led to a period of coexistence.

---

*"The Creation of Israel"*

Years have passed, until some Jews decided to overtake Palestine. So these Jews created a 
group called Israel. At first they wanted some part of the land, but they had planned to slowly 
increase the portion of the land to seize. So they asked for help in UK and US. Thinking that it 
will benefit them one day, US and UK agreed to help Israel take the land of PALESTINE. 

As tensions rose, Israel initiated actions against Palestine to expand its territory. 
Therefore, Israel started to strike some parts of Palestine in order to wipe out the land clean. 
Once Palestine felt triggered and in need of help, HAMAS sought to defend their country. 

---

*"Media and Misrepresentation"*

The media played a significant role in shaping the narrative. Just after a little shots from HAMAS, 
the Israel cried to US and UK for help. Israel portrayed HAMAS as terrorists, even when the reality 
was far more complex. They created fake stories about HAMAS.

---

**The Human Cost**

*"The Suffering of the Palestinian People"*

The conflict took a heavy toll on the Palestinian population. Discover the heartbreaking stories 
of Palestinian civilians, including children, who faced violence, imprisonment, and unimaginable suffering.

Now, Israel managed to seize many parts of the land of Palestine and they are becoming more and more 
violent towards the civilians of Palestine. They have been torturing Palestinians in jail, killed many 
Palestinian civilians which are mostly children (population of children are higher than adults in Palestine),
 and they have injured many people. They don't just shoot bullets. They made the Palestinians suffer. 
 I can't describe it here but I've seen too many videos of tortured Palestinians. You can find those videos 
 in YouTube, Tik Tok and Instagram. 

---

**"Free Palestine!"**

*"Seeking Justice"*

Finally, we end with a plea to raise awareness and advocate for change in this ongoing genocide. 
Explore various platforms where evidence of these hardships is documented and shared. 
Stand with us in the cry for freedom and justice in Palestine!

---

these companies and Israel's defense.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:38,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.strong,{children:"The Historical Context"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:46,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:46,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.em,{children:'"The Birth of Israel"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:48,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:48,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`So back to history, before the existence of Israel, there was a country called PALESTINE.\r
During the NAZI occupation, Jews were hated among countries. So the Jews came to Palestine and\r
begged for help. The warm welcome extended by Palestine led to a period of coexistence.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:50,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.hr,{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:54,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.em,{children:'"The Creation of Israel"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`Years have passed, until some Jews decided to overtake Palestine. So these Jews created a\r
group called Israel. At first they wanted some part of the land, but they had planned to slowly\r
increase the portion of the land to seize. So they asked for help in UK and US. Thinking that it\r
will benefit them one day, US and UK agreed to help Israel take the land of PALESTINE.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:58,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`As tensions rose, Israel initiated actions against Palestine to expand its territory.\r
Therefore, Israel started to strike some parts of Palestine in order to wipe out the land clean.\r
Once Palestine felt triggered and in need of help, HAMAS sought to defend their country.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:63,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.hr,{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:67,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.em,{children:'"Media and Misrepresentation"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:69,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:69,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`The media played a significant role in shaping the narrative. Just after a little shots from HAMAS,\r
the Israel cried to US and UK for help. Israel portrayed HAMAS as terrorists, even when the reality\r
was far more complex. They created fake stories about HAMAS.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:71,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.hr,{},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:75,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.strong,{children:"The Human Cost"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:77,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.em,{children:'"The Suffering of the Palestinian People"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:79,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:79,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`The conflict took a heavy toll on the Palestinian population. Discover the heartbreaking stories\r
of Palestinian civilians, including children, who faced violence, imprisonment, and unimaginable suffering.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:81,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`Now, Israel managed to seize many parts of the land of Palestine and they are becoming more and more\r
violent towards the civilians of Palestine. They have been torturing Palestinians in jail, killed many\r
Palestinian civilians which are mostly children (population of children are higher than adults in Palestine),\r
and they have injured many people. They don't just shoot bullets. They made the Palestinians suffer.\r
I can't describe it here but I've seen too many videos of tortured Palestinians. You can find those videos\r
in YouTube, Tik Tok and Instagram.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:84,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.strong,{children:'"Free Palestine!"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:93,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:93,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.em,{children:'"Seeking Justice"'},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:95,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:95,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`Finally, we end with a plea to raise awareness and advocate for change in this ongoing genocide.\r
Explore various platforms where evidence of these hardships is documented and shared.\r
Stand with us in the cry for freedom and justice in Palestine!`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\Nurul\\Documents\\Daya Business Projects\\ai-daya-official\\contents\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-0ed7ed6d-9863-4a72-8cee-6185a2ac3047.mdx",lineNumber:97,columnNumber:1},this),`
